pages.text: Not all materials are useful in their current form. By combining pieces of stone I have created a tool that allows me to grind down materials into a powdered form.
I can use the pestle by simply throwing the item I want to grind onto the floor and then interacting with it using the pestle.
The pestle is capable of grinding charcoal into ash which may be useful in the creation of future materials.
By grinding down these crystals that I collected from the depths of the abyss, I have created a powder that appears to be highly reactive to aquatic environments.
Whilst this may seem brutish, the feathers from these flightless birds could be useful later on.
Sweet! This device allows me to extract sugar from cane at a more efficient rate!
No more manual seed picking. The pestle allows me to extract seeds from each slice in plentiful amounts!
These pumpkins may be tough, but they're nothing for my pestle! A quick grind here and a quick grind there and alas we have ourselves a whole bag o' seeds!
Fertiliser can be tough to obtain so it's a good job that my pestle can extract it in mass.
Finally some payback for these little blighters! Should I decapitate another, I will be able to grind their head down into dust.
I've got a bone to pick with you, scoundrel! Ha.
I almost feel bad for this. They're already dead though? Right?
